data.text: Ɔbaa nyansafoɔ si ne dan,
Deɛ ne nanteɛ tene no suro Awurade,
Ɔkwasea kasa ma wɔbɔ nʼakyi abaa,
Baabi a anantwie nni no, adididaka no mu da mpan,
Ɔdanseni nokwafoɔ rennaadaa,
Ɔfɛdifoɔ hwehwɛ nyansa nanso ɔnnya,
Twe wo ho firi ɔkwasea ho,
Anitefoɔ nyansa ne sɛ wɔbɛdwene wɔn akwan ho,
Nkwaseafoɔ de bɔne ho adwensakyera di fɛ,
Akoma biara nim ɔyea ɛwɔ ne mu,
Wɔbɛsɛe mumuyɛfoɔ efie,
Ɛkwan bi wɔ hɔ a ɛyɛ wɔ onipa ani so,
Ɔsereɛ mu mpo, akoma tumi di yea,
Akyirisanfoɔ bɛnya akatua sɛdeɛ wɔn akwan teɛ,
Atetekwaa gye biribiara di,
Onyansafoɔ suro Awurade na ɔdwane bɔne,
Onipa a ne bo nkyɛre fuo no yɛ nkwaseadeɛ,
Ntetekwaafoɔ agyapadeɛ ne gyimie,
Nnipa bɔnefoɔ bɛkoto nnipa pa anim,
Ahiafoɔ deɛ, wɔn ayɔnkofoɔ mpo mpɛ wɔn anim ahwɛ,
Deɛ ɔbu ne yɔnko animtiaa yɛ bɔne,
Wɔn a wɔbɔ pɔ bɔne nyera ɛkwan anaa?
Adwumadenyɛ nyinaa de mfasoɔ ba,
Anyansafoɔ ahonya ne wɔn abotire,
Ɔdanseni nokwafoɔ gye nkwa,
Deɛ ɔsuro Awurade no wɔ banbɔ a emu yɛ den,
Awurade suro yɛ nkwa asutire,
Ɔman mu nnipa dodoɔ yɛ ɔhene animuonyam,
Onipa a ɔwɔ abodwokyerɛ wɔ nteaseɛ a emu dɔ,
Akoma mu asomdwoeɛ ma onipadua nkwa,
Deɛ ɔhyɛ ahiafoɔ soɔ no bu wɔn Yɛfoɔ animtiaa,
Sɛ amanehunu ba a amumuyɛfoɔ hwe ase,
Nyansa te nteaseɛ akoma mu,
Tenenee pagya ɔman
Ɔhene ani sɔ ɔsomfoɔ nyansani,
